data.title: Upper Shirley Vineyards Wedding by eMotion Pictures Wedding Films
data.meta_description: Cutest Dog Ring Bearer Ever, wedding video at Upper Shirley Vineyards in Charles City VirginiaMelissa and Doug had an amazing wedding at Upper Shirley Vineyards! I loved how they got their family involved in their day by having a family member perform the ceremony and of course by having their dog as the ring bearer! Vendors:Videographer: eMotion Pictures Wedding FilmsCoordinator: CCS EventsPhotographer: David Abel PhotographyVenue: Upper Shirley VineyardsFlorals: Photosynthesis Floral DesignEnt
data.text: Virginia-based wedding videographer that strives to capture the beauty and emotion of your special day. We believe in creating hand crafted, story-driven films that will transport you back to the moment and leave you with a lasting memory of your wedding. We are available for world travel and are based in Richmond, VA. Let us tell your wedding story and make it a film that you can cherish for years to come.
